item.title: Implementing Audit Logs in EF Core Without Polluting Your Entities
item.description: Most modern applications require the historical audit logging of changes made to database entities. The audit log provides you with insights into all changes made, including their timestamps and the users responsible for those changes. The logs ensure transparency, allowing stakeholders to observe what changes were made to business-critical data, Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/implementing-audit-logs-in-ef-core-without-polluting-your-entities/
